name: Untouched
description:
Untouched is a 1940’s narrative and house exploration game, loosely inspired by W.F. Hermans’ ‘An Untouched House’. 

Through a series of unsent letters, as well as the exploration of both mundane and surreal environments, you can uncover the story of the couple that once lived there. 

It might just be a collection of bricks, floorboards, and plaster, but this home meant so much more to those that gave it life.

***

Recommended Settings:

  • 1080p.
  • Headphones (volume > 50%). 
  • Recommended for Windows. 

***

For more information, I've uploaded a post to my main website:  https://marcusansley.com/2020/08/26/untouched/

Full Walkthrough (spoliers): https://youtu.be/XkZ66eblGGY
